trans-unit.source: Terminates the running workflow instance, raises the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*> event in the host, and reports error information.
trans-unit.target: Avslutter kjører arbeidsflytforekomsten, opphøyer den <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*>hendelsen i verten og rapporter feilinformasjon.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*>

trans-unit.source: Once the workflow is terminated, it cannot be resumed.
trans-unit.target: Når arbeidsflyten avsluttes, kan ikke fortsette.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the exception that provoked the instance termination.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir unntak av at provoked forekomsten avslutning.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> is set.
trans-unit.target: Unntak som er sendt til <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>er en <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>Hvis bare <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>er angitt.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If only Exception is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det bare unntaket er angitt, er unntak som sendt til <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> and Exception are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, and Exception is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis både <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>og unntaket er angitt, en <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>er sendt med angitt <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, og unntaket er angitt som unntaket <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
A string input argument with the reason for the workflow instance termination.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inndata argumentet med årsaken til arbeidsflyten forekomsten avslutning.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only Reason is set.
trans-unit.target: Unntak som er sendt til <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>er en <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>Hvis bare årsaken er angitt.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det bare <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>er angitt, at unntaket er sendt til <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both Reason and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified Reason, and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis begge årsak og <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>er angitt en <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>er sendt med den angitte årsaken, og <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>er angitt som unntaket <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
